adept.utilities

Class CommandLineArgParse

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.utilities.CommandLineArgParse
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeftReaderArgParse

    public class CommandLineArgParse
extends Object
    Parse DEFT command-line arguments using args4j.
